description: Try our easy to follow Tropical Fruit Smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Christmas,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Mango,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Tropical Fruit Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 mango cheek, roughly chopped, frozen (see Summer sunset iceblocks recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: Place frozen fruit and milk in a blender and blend until smooth. To serve, add pulp to 2 serving glasses and pour in smoothie.
